title: Robert C. deKieffer Endowed Program Support Fund
description: To provide general support for the Program in Environmental Design at the University of Colorado Boulder. The Fund will provide flexible resources for advancing strategic initiatives, strengthening core offerings and addressing ENVD's greatest needs.
